summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2789 for the improvement of Ewing Street, from Fremont Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or other suitable material laid upon a proper foundation constructing armored concrete curbs, concrete side walks, sewers, watermains, grading where necessary, under Ordinance No. 33347, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
